definition: to lean/to slant/oblique/prejudiced/to deviate from average/to stray from the intended line/stubbornly/contrary to expectations

sentences.english: Xiao Hong's former residence was situated at the South Second Street located on the secluded corner of this county town.
sentences.chinese: 蕭紅故居，坐落於縣城較偏僻的南二道街。

sentences.english: The town was quiet but remote, they felt very happ though.
sentences.chinese: 小城幽靜而偏僻，他們感覺卻很幸福。

sentences.english: The village in an out-of-the-way mountain area.
sentences.chinese: 這個村子位於一個偏僻的山區。

sentences.english: I'm really excited to be in the middle of nowhere.
sentences.chinese: 我特別想生活在偏僻安靜的地方。

sentences.english: Dolon and settled in at an out-of-the-way inn.
sentences.chinese: 他們進入多倫，在一家偏僻的小店裏住了下來。

sentences.english: The school seems a little remote, but it's still a good opportunity.
sentences.chinese: 校址好像太偏僻些，可是不失爲一個機會。

sentences.english: He lives alone in a lonely mountain village, but he doesn't feel lonely .
sentences.chinese: 他獨自一人住在一個偏僻的山村裏，但並不覺得孤獨。

sentences.english: It takes us hours to get to her house.
sentences.chinese: 我奶奶住的地方很偏僻，要花好幾個小時才能到她家。

sentences.english: A jet plane lands and taxis onto a remote airstrip.
sentences.chinese: 一架噴氣式飛機滑行並降落在一個偏僻的飛機跑道上。

sentences.english: Then the letter can bee - mailed to remote, high- altitude post - offices in this Himalayan region.
sentences.chinese: 郵遞員是這些偏僻地區和外界聯繫的唯一方式。

sentences.english: Remoteness of the rental date, there is looting and other possible hidden safety problems exist.
sentences.chinese: 地處偏僻的日租房，有可能存在搶劫等安全隱患。

sentences.english: The mail runner is the only means of communication in some remote areas.
sentences.chinese: 郵遞員是這些偏僻地區和外界聯繫的唯一方式。

sentences.english: Said two hairs secretly escape break temple, dark lonely hiding and pick the technical secondary school.
sentences.chinese: 卻說二毛偷偷逃出破廟，黑暗中專挑偏僻處躲藏而去。

sentences.english: It is one of the last wild and lonely places in England.
sentences.chinese: 它是最後狂放和偏僻的地方的當中一個在英國。

sentences.english: The little harbour, ringed round with hills, is so secluded that it has nothing of the aspect of a port about it.
sentences.chinese: 這個羣山環繞的小海港，偏僻到沒有一點港口的樣子。

sentences.english: Backcountry Ski the 10th Mountain Division Huts.
sentences.chinese: 偏僻地區滑雪橇第10山脈賽區小屋。

definition: no sign of human habitation (idiom); desolate
lit. men's footprints are rare (idiom)/fig. off the beaten track/lonely/deserted
